mapper.insert: insert into project_info (project_id,project_name, company_id, project_industry, publish_date, period, contract_person, contract_phone, project_member_count, area, on_spot, file_material, project_desc, remark, fee, status, budget) values (#{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectIndustry,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{publishDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{period,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{contractPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contractPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectMemberCount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{area,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{onSpot,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileMaterial,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{budget,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
